spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower one of your socketed elemental gems, granting 467 of their associated stat for 12 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Hitting an enemy with Tiger Palm or Spinning Crane Kick grants Brewmaster's Rhythm, increasing damage dealt and reducing damage taken by 1% for 15 sec, stacking up to 4 times.
Set: For each stack of Brewmaster's Rhythm, Purifying Brew clears 3% more of your damage delayed with Stagger.

spells.description: Equip: Dealing Fire damage has a chance to ignite your enemies, burning them for an additional 4,858 damage every 2 seconds.

Equip: Succumb to the Icon's whispers and become Infused with Earth, increasing your Versatility by 445. 

Fighting alongside allies who are Infused with Fire or Frost has a chance to grant you 241 of their Infusion's stat for 12 sec.

Infusion based on your current specialization.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to increase your Agility by 1,146 for 10 sec and extend the duration of your active phial by 60 sec.

equipped_items.description: Can be used for transmutations in place of a Philosopher's Stone.
